biotools.summary: NEPdb is a database of T-cell experimentally-validated neoantigens and pan-cancer predicted neoepitopes for cancer immunotherapy. It contains more than 17,000 validated human immunogenic and non-immunogenic neoepitope entries with human leukocyte antigens (HLAs) and T cell information, curated from published literatures.
